console.hug: allowed count in range of 0-100, with hug number will set 100
console.negative: allowed count in range of 0-100, with negative number will set 1

response.unknown_exception: Unknown problem with requesting or DotaAPI

api.no_players: Match ids does not exists for some account(s)
api.no_match_ids: Top players does not exists, see logs.log messages
